title: Introduction to Psychedelics
subtitle: Why we seek these experiences and what's actually possible
description: An honest exploration of why humans have always sought psychedelic experiences. This course examines what people are actually looking for when they turn to these substances, the current state of research, the real risks and benefits, and how to think clearly about whether this path is right for you.
